Jeanne Franco {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Currently searching for a Data Engineer or Data Scientist position

Currently I am a collaborator of the company Beta Analítica that helps in statistical analysis consultancies for universities and companies. I am also one of the organizers of the R-Ladies Natal community, an organization with the mission of promoting gender diversity in the R software community. I am enthusiastic about using R for data science with experience in data visualization using the ggplot2 package, manipulating data tables with the dplyr package, producing reports with R Markdown and tech applications with shiny. I am interested in Python, SQL, BigQuery, JavaScript and am learning about HTML and CSS.
